1370: Scilla moved to Kerckstraet.C.5 after marriage.
Got married to Wissen at age 24 in 1370.
Gave birth to Sander in 1370 at age 24.
1374: Gave birth to Emgelberna in 1374 at age 28.
1375: Gave birth to Wilbord in 1375 at age 29.
1376: Gave birth to Hughekine in 1376 at age 30.
1377: Gave birth to Folpertus in 1377 at age 31.
1381: Gave birth to Brun in 1381 at age 35.
1382: Gave birth to Lutgeri in 1382 at age 36.
1383: Gave birth to Hodine in 1383 at age 37.
1386: Gave birth to Pietersen in 1386 at age 40.
